about.title: About EPFPS
about.subtitle: Private School for Health Professionals Training of Meiganga
about.historyText1: The Private School for Health Professionals Training of Meiganga (EPFPS) was created in response to the growing need for qualified health professionals in the Adamawa region and Cameroon in general.
about.historyText2: Since its creation, our institution has established itself as a reference in health professionals training, combining academic rigor, practical excellence and human values.
about.historyText3: Recognized by the Ministry of Public Health of Cameroon, EPFPS trains hundreds of students each year who contribute to improving the national health system.
about.missionText: To train competent, ethical and dedicated health professionals, capable of responding to the health challenges of Cameroon and Africa, emphasizing academic excellence and a human approach to care.
about.visionText: To be the reference school in Central Africa for health professionals training, recognized for pedagogical innovation, applied research and the social impact of its graduates.
about.valuesText: Excellence, Integrity, Compassion, Innovation, Respect for diversity, Community engagement and Sustainable development. These values guide each of our actions and decisions.
about.leadershipSubtitle: An experienced team dedicated to excellence in health training
about.approvedText: Ministry of Public Health of Cameroon

formations.title: Our Programs
formations.subtitle: Quality programs to train tomorrow's health professionals
formations.excellenceText: EPFPS offers state-recognized training, combining theory and practice to guarantee the employability of our graduates in the health sector.
formations.recognizedDiplomasText: All our diplomas are recognized by the State of Cameroon
formations.practicalTrainingText: 50% of time in internships at our partner hospitals
formations.nursingAidDescription: Complete training in basic care, hospital hygiene and patient support.
formations.stateNurseDescription: In-depth training in nursing care, pharmacology and medical emergency management.
formations.communityHealthAgentDescription: Training in primary health care and prevention in rural communities.
formations.theoreticalCoursesText: Acquisition of fundamental knowledge with expert teachers
formations.practicalWorkText: Practice in our equipped laboratories and simulation rooms
formations.clinicalInternshipsText: Professional immersion in our partner hospitals and centers
formations.continuousAssessmentText: Regular assessments and state exams to validate skills
formations.readyToJoinText: Discover our admission conditions and start your journey towards a career in health

admissions.title: Admissions
admissions.subtitle: Join us for excellence training in health
admissions.step1Text: Submit your application with all required documents
admissions.step2Text: Review of your profile by our admission committee
admissions.step3Text: Motivation interview with our pedagogical managers
admissions.step4Text: Confirmation of your place and finalization of registration
admissions.noteText: Installment payment possible. Scholarships available for deserving students.
admissions.readyToApplyText: Download the application file and start your journey with us

news.title: News
news.subtitle: Discover the latest news from EPFPS

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are here to answer all your questions
contact.subject: Subject
contact.formSubmitMessage: Thank you for your message! We will respond to you as soon as possible.
contact.addressText: Private School for Health Professionals Training
contact.byCarText: From Meiganga city center, take the Ngaoundéré road for 2 km, then turn right at the EPFPS sign.
contact.byPublicTransportText: Take a taxi-moto or taxi from the central market. Destination: "EPFPS Health School" (5 minutes from center).
contact.landmarksText: The school is located near Meiganga regional hospital, opposite the Total gas station.
contact.parkingText: Free parking available on campus for visitors and students.

testimonials.title: What they say about us
testimonials.subtitle: Discover authentic testimonials from our students and graduates who are making a difference in the health sector today.

fatima.quote: The nursing training at EPFPS gave me all the necessary skills to succeed. The teachers are dedicated and the practical internships excellent.
fatima.name: Fatima Mballa
fatima.title: Graduate in Nursing

emmanuel.quote: The practical approach to teaching and personalized support allowed me to develop my confidence and professional skills.
emmanuel.name: Emmanuel Ngono
emmanuel.title: 3rd year student

marie.quote: Thanks to my training at EPFPS, I now contribute to improving the health of my community. The school gave me the tools to make a difference.
marie.name: Marie Tchounkeu
marie.title: 2023 Graduate

satisfaction.title: Student satisfaction rate
satisfaction.subtitle: Based on a survey of 500+ students and graduates

campusLife.title: Campus life
campusLife.subtitle: Discover an inspiring and dynamic community where our students evolve in an environment rich in academic, social and cultural activities, promoting their personal and professional development.
campusLife.classroomsDesc: Rooms equipped with the latest technologies for interactive and collaborative learning.
campusLife.studyDesc: Areas dedicated to group work and collaborative projects between students.
campusLife.libraryDesc: Access to a rich collection of medical and scientific works, silent reading spaces.
campusLife.labDesc: Modern laboratories equipped for practical work in medical and biological sciences.
campusLife.relaxDesc: Rest and socialization areas to encourage exchanges between students.

studentTestimonial.quote: The campus atmosphere is exceptional. The spaces are modern, the teachers are available and the spirit of collaboration between students pushes us to give our best every day.
studentTestimonial.name: Amina Moussa
studentTestimonial.title: 2nd year student - Nursing aide

news.title: Our News
news.subtitle: Stay informed about the latest news, events and developments from our health training school.
news.emergencyDesc: Discover our new training program specialized in emergency care, designed to meet the growing needs of the health sector...
news.partnershipDesc: Our school strengthens its ties with the regional hospital to offer better practical internship opportunities to our students...
news.graduationDesc: Congratulations to our 150 new graduates who join the health sector with excellence and dedication...

cta.title: Ready to start your journey in the health sector?
cta.subtitle: Join our community of passionate students and prepare to make a difference in the world of health. Your future starts here!

footer.description: Training tomorrow's health professionals with excellence, rigor and humanity. Your future in the health sector starts here.
